issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
We are just getting the text x,y,z & timestamp but no values for them.

Not a Regression, occurs with 2.0.2GA

Steps to reproduce:
1.Build kitchen sink for mobile web in titanium studio.
2.Type the ip address of your laptop into the mobile device's web browser.(safari for iphone & IE for windows phone). 
3.Hit go or enter.
4.Kitchen sink will fire up in the browser.
5.Tap on phone tab.
6.Tap on the Accelerometer table row.
7.You will get a page with x,y,z & timestamp.
8.There are no values coming in for these fields.

Actual result:
1.We are not getting any values for x,y,z,timestamp.

Expected result:
1.We should get a proper acceleration for the x,y,z & timestamp fields.
fields.summary: MobileWeb:Phone-->Accelerometer:We are just getting the fields x,y,z & timestamp but no values for them.
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio : 2.1.0.201206062004
SDK Version : 2.1.0.v20120607000247
Iphone 4.3.5
Windows Phone Mango

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
